chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (k s : nat) (a b : option A) (e : env A), k <= s -> raw_insert k a (raw_insert s b e) = raw_insert (1 + s) b (raw_insert k a e)

Premises:
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
Build_SubstSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)) -> SubstSubst
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
Nat.log2_mul_above : forall a b : nat, 0 <= a -> 0 <= b -> Nat.log2 (a * b) <= Nat.log2 a + Nat.log2 b + 1
lookup_shift_insert : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), lookup (shift y x) (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
lift_lift : forall t k s wk ws : nat, k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t)
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
Nat.pow_succ_r : forall a b : nat, 0 <= b -> a ^ S b = a * a ^ b
Build_LiftSubst2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> LiftSubst2
subst_subst : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s : nat) (w : ?V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?H0 : [ |- Subst ?V ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?SubstSubst : [ |- SubstSubst]
raw_insert_zero : forall (A : Type) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert 0 o e = o :: e
Record LiftLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftLift { lift_lift : forall (t : T) (k s wk ws : nat), k <= s -> lift wk k (lift ws s t) = lift ws (wk + s) (lift wk k t) } Arguments LiftLift {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftLift [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Nat.pow_neg_r : forall a b : nat, b < 0 -> a ^ b = 0
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst
Nat.log2_lt_pow2 : forall a b : nat, 0 < a -> a < 2 ^ b < -> Nat.log2 a < b
lift_subst_2 : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst2 : [ |- LiftSubst2]
Record LiftSubst2 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst2 { lift_subst_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Nat.log2_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, 2 ^ S p = q + S r -> r < 2 ^ p -> let s := Nat.log2_iter k p q r in 2 ^ s <= k + q < 2 ^ S s
Nat.log2_eq_succ_is_pow2 : forall a : nat, Nat.log2 (S a) = S (Nat.log2 a) -> exists b : nat, S a = 2 ^ b
lift_subst : forall (t : ?T) (k : nat) (v : ?V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) where ?V : [ |- Type] ?H : [ |- Lift ?V] ?T : [ |- Type] ?H0 : [ |- Lift ?T] ?H1 : [ |- Subst ?V ?T] ?LiftSubst : [ |- LiftSubst]
Record LiftSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst { lift_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
lookup_map_none : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = None -> lookup x (map f e) = None
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
Record div_theory (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cadd cmul : C -> C -> C) (phi : C -> R) (cdiv : C -> C -> C * C) : Prop := mkdiv_th { div_eucl_th : forall a b : C, let (q, r) := cdiv a b in req (phi a) (phi (cadd (cmul b q) r)) } Arguments div_theory [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments mkdiv_th [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
